Publisher: New York, Linden Press / Simon and Schuster, 1985., 1985 New York, Linden Press / Simon and Schuster, 1985., 1985. First edition. 8vo. Dust jacket designed by Carin Goldberg (unclipped; light soiling). Very good-fine. 256 pages. No other signatures or bookplates. Signed and inscribed by Aram Saroyan on the page after front free endpaper: "For a World Champion from a lifetime fan - with deepest thanks and love, Aram 6/25/85." Provenance: from the estate of Charles Williamson.. Inscribed by Author(s). 1st Edition. Hardcover. Very Good/Very Good....
